title: Christine McGuinness clearly doesn't feel the cold in mini-skirt
text:
Christine was loving life (Picture: Backgrid)

October hasn’t been too great in terms of weather for the United Kingdom, but it seems Christine McGuinness has found a pocket of sunshine in Cheshire.

The 31-year-old was somehow feeling the heat while out and about in Cheshire today, wearing a vest and a mini-skirt.

Now, the forecast for Cheshire today predicted highs of 13 degrees and lows of 8, so either Christine just doesn’t feel the chill or she’s invested in a time machine back to July.

The mum-of-three was giving us Cher from Clueless vibes in her plaid mini-skirt teamed with a simple vest top and knee-high boots.

The star somehow found the sun (Picture: FARRELL / BACKGRID)

Cher Horowitz eat your heart out (Picture: FARRELL / BACKGRID)

The Real Housewives of Cheshire star accessorised her look with huge sunglasses – again, it’s October – and a Louis Vuitton handbag for a very Beverly Hills circa 1995 mood.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Except again, she was in Cheshire in October 2019.

We all know Christine – who is married to Top Gear star Paddy – likes to take a risk with fashion, as evidenced by her see-through gown at the Manchester Fashion Festival.

And you know what? We salute her.

Christine stars in the Real Housewives of Cheshire (Picture: FARRELL / BACKGRID)

Christine admits she worries about Paddy (Picture: David M. Benett/Dave Benett/Getty Images)

The star’s husband Paddy was best known for hosting Take Me Out when he was confirmed as one of the new hosts of Top Gear alongside Freddie Flintoff and Chris Harris last year.

And Paddy driving super-fast supercars understandably worries Christine more than him matchmaking singles on ITV.

Speaking to The Mirror, Christine said: ‘I do worry about him. When he got it [the job] my first thought was, “Oh my god, I really hope he’s sensible”, because obviously I want him to be careful.

‘I tell him not to go too fast.

‘He’s pretty good at driving. We’ve usually got the kids with us. He’s very sensible, but when he’s on the show he goes back to being a boy in a car.’

Paddy, 46, and Christine have been married since 2011 and have three kids together – six year-old twins Penelope and Leo and Felicity, three.
